alert.note: Alert for Berrien; Branch; Cass; Hillsdale; St. Joseph (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Hydrologic Outlook issued May 02 at 3:58AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Potential Flooding Tuesday into Midweek... Widespread showers and isolated thunderstorms will overspread the region late tonight and continue through Tuesday. Storms totals of 1 to 2 inches with isolated amounts up to 3 inches are expected, but not certain. Runoff from this amount of rainfall would lead to flooding of low-lying, flood prone areas, streams and creeks Tuesday. Larger rivers would then respond with at least minor flooding into midweek. Areas that observed heavy rainfall Saturday into Sunday will be particularly susceptible to flooding, including east central and northeast Indiana into northwest Ohio. While flooding is not a certainty, it is possible, especially in the Upper Wabash and Maumee River Basins. There also may be some ponding on area roads Tuesday. If you live in areas prone to flooding, monitor the latest forecasts and statements, including possible flood watches and warnings.

area.areaDesc: Berrien; Branch; Cass; Hillsdale; St. Joseph
